price: 19. Ne soyez pas comme ceux qui ont oublié Allah ! Allah a fait qu’ils s’oublient eux-mêmes. Ceux-là sont les pervers.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna nasū al-laha fa-ansāhum anfusahum ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
